message.body: Would you happen to know how much it costs to get blood work done? I haven't been feeling well.
Alot hundreds. Feeling tired and fuzzy???
Kinda shaky, chest is a little tight, sometimes all my muscles start the clinch up, I haven't been able to eat much, sometimes my heart starts racing and its really scary.
Damn Santana u need to c a doctor. What have u been doing to feel like that.
No idea. I feel worse around 5 or 6pm every day. Ever hear of anything like that?
Rheumatoid arthritis it's not just arthritis it's affects heart n stuff. Mayb lymes too
I guess I got some more googling to do.
I hope u feel better soon I love u
Do you know how I would go about getting that blood work? Do I just call a hospital?
No a doctor has to order it. U have to have a script. But there's lots of stuff they could check n it can b very expensive.
